name: Wire ninja sk8er
description:
Aim for the stage win with a combination of wire and jump action! !

[Game Description]

It is a game that leads to the goal Stick skateboard in advance.

Jump by Accumulate jumping ability while you touch the screen and let go!

The fire wire by tapping the "Shinobi" block.

Make the wire action in a state of being as it is tapped.

Wire is released to force the position of the player below, and go to the rear.

Aim at the goal by taking advantage well the characteristics of both.

It will become more and more difficult with each passing stage.

Please do your best with the aim of all the stages clear.
